name: Housemarque
info:
• 别名: Housemarque Oy
  • 生日: 1995年7月19日
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
detail: Housemarque Oy is a Finnish video game developer based in Helsinki. The company was founded by Ilari Kuittinen and Harri Tikkanen in July 1995, through the merger of their previous video game companies, Bloodhouse and Terramarque, both of which were founded in 1993 as Finland's first commercial developers. Housemarque is the oldest active developer in Finland and has about 80 employees as of January 2020.
